You plan to visit 7 European cities for 16 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 2 days in Milan. During day 13 and day 14, you have to attend a conference in Milan. You would like to visit Valencia for 3 days. You would like to visit Frankfurt for 2 days. You plan to stay in Santorini for 3 days. You would like to meet your friends at Santorini between day 11 and day 13 to tour together. You would like to visit Mykonos for 3 days. You want to spend 5 days in Manchester. You would like to visit Rome for 4 days. You have to attend a workshop in Rome between day 1 and day 4.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Manchester and Milan, Santorini and Milan, Rome and Frankfurt, Rome and Manchester, Frankfurt and Milan, Valencia and Frankfurt, Rome and Valencia, Rome and Santorini, Frankfurt and Manchester, Milan and Mykonos, Rome and Mykonos, Manchester and Santorini, Valencia and Milan.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 16 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
